Description: Recent clinical advances in both cancer vaccines and cellular therapies as immunotherapy treatments for solid tumors have drawn from both new vaccine and cellular engineering technologies, as well as major advances in fundamental science at the intersection of antigen presentation and T cell recognition. This Major Symposium will cover the current state-of-the-art in computational biology of tumor antigens, high throughput tools for the discovery and validation of tumor antigens, and pre-clinical approaches for translating tumor antigens into immunotherapies for the treatment of patients with solid tumors.
SearchResultBody: SY41. Antigen Discovery and Validation for Cancer Vaccines
Title: Antigen Discovery and Validation for Cancer Vaccines
